content:
ChristianWeyer commented on Issue #937:

Is there any projected ETA for the new Rust-based implementation @kubkon?
Thanks.

kubkon commented on Issue #937:

Hi @ChristianWeyer! It's been a while since I looked into this but this very functionality now come back around at work for me so I'll be revisiting it in the coming days and hopefully will get something functional soon-ish. I'll report back when a working PR is submitted.

ChristianWeyer commented on Issue #937:

Did you already find some minutes... @kubkon ? ;-)
